Articles.Content: Ok, Today, I have dealt with a series of launches using raidernick's Proton Rocket carrying Zarya. So far, all I have faced were idiot moves! and the payload was lost!
Good job Sampa...try using the Zarya-Proton combo that I made...lol
Ok, Zarya is in orbit. now using my/Mike-NZ's shuttle mod to launch Unity. pictures to come
ok, gotta track down a systems bug...the shuttle crews do not like exploding robotic arms
Is this the start of the robot revolution? Are the robots and their explosive armaments finally taking over?

nope, just bugs in the system...and the Unity module jammed in the cargo bay and Bob got fed up and left the orbiter...great

- - - Updated - - -

Shuttle delivery of unity module delayed until bug can be tracked...
Temporarily pulling the arm from the shuttle and using minitugs for construction through z-1 truss.
Serious computer glitch disallowed me from opening steam and thereby ksp today. Might have a chance tomorrow to do something!
